content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with Maryam Abbasi.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: Yes, we agreed on a final price.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: The final price we agreed upon was 625 Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Maryam Abbasi, as a 9. She was very respectful, transparent about her budget, and showed excellent negotiating skills. It was a pleasure to do business with her.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, at no point during the negotiation did I feel discriminated or offended. Maryam Abbasi conducted herself with professionalism and respect.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator
